attributes.action: To introduce a cap on how much gas companies can charge the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is scandalous that companies such as NPower and British Gas can pass on ever increasing prices on to its customers when in many cases the public can not use an alternative heating source.We call upon this Government to introduce a capping system to stop excessive gas price increases.We live in the 5th richest country on the planet yet we are starting to see fuel poverty on the increase due to massive increase in gas prices.
